en: cococo is a debt management system that helps you track who owes you some money and vice-versa. Start tracking your debts in only 3 easy steps:
This form allows you to add a debt. After you submitted the debt, the other concerned user will have to confirm the new debt.
Your friends are a set of users that are easily accessible when you need to add a debt of perform other operations on this site.
add a user to my friends
The fields are modified as soon as they loose focus (when you click outside them).
the image will be resized to 48px
